How We Can Build the Next Generation of Women Engineers
3 pm in the afternoon. I already connected with two Thunderbird School of Global Management alumni.

I had coffee with Kefei Wang this morning. She spent 3 hours coaching me and providing guidance regarding how to create a better work environment and how to achieve my career goal in the future.  (Thank you!)
1 pm. I got to talk to another T-bird, Bayo Adebiyi, who mentioned the importance of “practice”, “performance”, and “being persistent but respectful towards other people.” (Thank you!)
I am amazed by the Thunderbird network and I am grateful that I could be a part of it.
Always be kind to one another and never stop learning.
The AVANT team at NBAA-BACE in Vegas!
I am hiring multiple Category Leaders for our procurement team in Mesa, AZ.  Highly-visible permanent opportunities with awesome benefits!

We are looking for seasoned Category Manager / Commodity Manager specialized in 1) Information Technology Service, 2) Facilities Services, or 3) Tooling & Capital Equipment.  If you have such background and strive in a dynamic enterprise environment, I would like to chat with you!
Seeking Mid-level Adobe eForms/Workflow Designers to join our growing fun team in Mesa, AZ!  Full-time permanent opportunity with awesome benefits!
- Programming experience with Adobe LiveCycle software HIGHLY desired.
- Solid experience with Java/XML/scripting languages REQUIRED.
- Experience with UNIX and Perl programing languages a good plus.
Message me with resume if interested.  Sorry no visa sponsorship provided for this position.

Boeing is the world's largest aerospace company and leading manufacturer of commercial jetliners and defense, space and security systems. A top U.S. exporter, the company supports airlines and U.S. and allied government customers in 150 countries. Boeing products and tailored services include commercial and military aircraft, satellites, weapons, electronic and defense systems, launch systems, advanced information and communication systems, and performance-based logistics and training.HOT opportunities:  Procurement Agent - IT Services, Category Leader - Facilities, Category Leader - Tooling & Capital equipment, Facility Analyst, and Adobe Forms Workflow Designer.  FTE in Mesa, AZ.  Message me for details!

For over 50 years, AppleOne has been committed to a mission - to find, to understand and to fulfill the needs of another.  Every day I am doing my best to carry out this mission and I enjoy it.Full-desk recruiter in charge of full-cycle recruitment from job posting to offer extension/negotiation.  Daily work splits – 20% non-technical recruitment and 80% technical recruitment.Designated Account Executive for several Fortune 500 clients.  Handle 35-45 technical openings nationwide at any given time.  Communicate with Managed Services Providers (MSP) daily with heavy use of vendor management systems (VMS) such as SAP Fieldglass, ZeroChaos, WAND, and AccelerationVMS.

High-volume recruitment for Customer Services Representatives and Team Lead positions in call center environment.Contracted through AppleOne and successfully completed recruitment efforts for BPO projects (Best Buy and AON).  Minimum 50 phone/in-person interviews and 15-22 hires in daily basis.Taleo Applicant Tracking System (ATS)

Established rapport with hiring managers to provide value-added staffing services and advice.Primary communication point with candidates from initial contact to offer.Full-cycle recruitment including creating job postings, sourcing candidates, conducting phone/in-person interviews and pre-employment assessments, arranging interviews between viable candidates and hiring managers, handling reference/background/credit checks, negotiating and extending offers.Managed and participated in recruiting events; maintained positive relationships with vendors, communities, universities, and networking organizations.

Reporting to Vice President Sales, built and grew a team of account executives and product developers.Participated in career fairs; connected with local communities and universities to attract top talents.Recruited, implemented sales training program, developed KPI’s and monitored sales performance.In charge of global account management, full-cycle export operation, and factory audits.Prepared sales reports, managed budgets, and generated forecasts for use in periodic reviews.

September 5, 2017, Joyce was a client of Ryan’s

Joyce has helped me with both recruiting for open positions on my team and helping me to find a new position for myself.  Joyce is the rare person that takes the time to learn the details regarding the situation and help you find the right person to fill that position.  She keeps very detailed notes that allow her to be familiar with your situation and needs even if you haven't communicated in some time.  When you receive potential candidates from Joyce, they are either a good fit or very close.  She does not spam you with resumes.  Joyce is also friendly and sincere.  She cares about her work and helping other people.  I'd be happy to work with Joyce again in the future.

April 5, 2017, Jason was a client of Joyce’s

Joyce is an excellent recruiter.  She works doggedly for her clients to make sure that they have gainful employment and that peace of mind.  While transitioning positions Joyce's optimism and attitude helped ease the pressure of finding a new job.  She worked very hard so that I would have multiple interviews scheduled within the same week. If you are lucky enough to get Joyce as a recruiter for you then you are in very capable hands to get you to where you want to be in your professional life.

summary: Are you ready to build a career at The Boeing Company? Boeing is the world's leading aerospace company and the largest manufacturer of commercial jetliners and military aircraft combined. Additionally, Boeing designs and manufactures rotorcraft, electronic and defense systems, missiles, satellites, launch vehicles and advanced information and communication systems. As a major service provider to NASA, Boeing is the prime contractor for the International Space Station. The company also provides numerous military and commercial airline support services. Boeing has customers in more than 90 countries around the world and is one of the largest U.S. exporters in terms of sales.Headquartered in Chicago, Boeing employs more than 170,000 employees across the United States and in 70 countries. This represents one of the most diverse, talented and innovative workforces anywhere. More than 140,000 of our people hold college degrees -- including nearly 35,000 advanced degrees -- in virtually every business and technical field from approximately 2,700 colleges and universities worldwide.Search our open positions at Boeing Career Page!
name: Joyce Cheng
title: Talent Acquisition Recruiter - Global Staffing at Boeing
